task.title: Set Enforce Unique Host
task.shortdesc: Configure to use only unique physical machines for redundant copies of partitioned region data.

taskbody.prereq: Understand how to set a member's gemfire.properties settings. See .

step.cmd: Configure your members so always uses different physical machines for redundant copies of partitioned region data using the gemfire.properties setting enforce-unique-host. The default for this setting is false.
